Main_Party_Desc: Elemental Resonance and Character Equipment System
Policy_Intro_1: At Genshin Simul, accessible from https://genshin-simul.com, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Genshin Simul and how we use it.
Policy_Intro_2: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
Policy_Intro_3: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Genshin Simul. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
Policy_Consent_Content: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
Policy_Collect_Content_1: The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.
Policy_Collect_Content_2: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.
Policy_Collect_Content_3: When you register for an Account, we may ask for your contact information, including items such as name, company name, address, email address, and telephone number.
Policy_Use_Content: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
Policy_Use_List1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
Policy_Use_List2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
Policy_Use_List3: Understand and analyze how you use our website
Policy_Use_List4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
Policy_Use_List5: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes
Policy_Log_Content: Genshin Simul follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.
Policy_Ad_Content1: You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of Genshin Simul.
Policy_Ad_Content2: Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on Genshin Simul, which are sent directly to users' browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit.
Policy_Ad_Content3: Note that Genshin Simul has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers.
Policy_Third_Content1: Genshin Simul's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options.{' '}
Policy_Third_Content2: You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers' respective websites.
Policy_CCPA_Content1: CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
Policy_CCPA_Content2: Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:
Policy_CCPA_Content3: Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
Policy_CCPA_Content4: Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
Policy_CCPA_Content5: Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.
Policy_CCPA_Content6: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
Policy_GDPR_Content1: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
Policy_GDPR_Content2: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
Policy_GDPR_Content3: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
Policy_GDPR_Content4: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
Policy_GDPR_Content5: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
Policy_GDPR_Content6: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
Policy_GDPR_Content7: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
Policy_GDPR_Content8: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
Policy_Children_Content1: Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.
Policy_Children_Content2: Genshin Simul does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
Notice_Content1: Genshin Simul provides contents to simulate Genshin-Impact in-game systems based on our database.
Notice_Content2: Genshin Simul is not affiliated with or certified by miHoYo.
Notice_Content3: So Genshin Simul can work differently than the Genshin-Impact.
Novice_Finish: Novice Wishes is finished. Click Reset or Wish × 10 button
If_Inventory_Blank: There is no item in inventory... Click Wish × 10 button!
Help_Warning: This is just fun! Don't be serious.
Lost_Prayer_to_the_Sacred_Winds: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
MartialArtist_TwoPieceSet: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%
RetracingBolide_TwoPieceSet: Increases the effectiveness of shields by 35%
Instructor_FourPieceSet: After causing an elemental reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s
Berserker_FourPieceSet: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%
TheExile_FourPieceSet:
Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s.
This effect cannot stack
ResolutionOfSojourner_FourPieceSet: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%
MartialArtist_FourPieceSet: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s
DefenderOfWill_FourPieceSet: Increases Elemental RES by 30% for each element present in the party
TinyMiracle_FourPieceSet:
Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s.
Can only occur once every 10s
BraveHeart_FourPieceSet: Increases DMG by 30% against enemies with more than 50% HP
Gambler_FourPieceSet: Defeating an enemy has 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.
Scholar_FourPieceSet:
Gaining Energy gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped.
Can only occurs once every 3s
GladiatorOfFinaleFinale_FourPieceSet: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%
MaidenBeloved_FourPieceSet: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s
NoblesseOblige_FourPieceSet:
Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s.
This effect cannot stack
BloodstainedChivalry_FourPieceSet: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s
WandererOfTroupe_FourPieceSet: Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or Bow
ViridescentVenerer_FourPieceSet: Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s
ThunderingFury_FourPieceSet:
Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, and Superconduct DMG by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s.
Can only occur once every 0.8s
Thundersoother_FourPieceSet: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Electro by 35%
CrimsonWitchOfFlames_FourPieceSet:
Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%.
Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s.
Max 3 stacks
Lavawalker_FourPieceSet: Increases DMG against enemies that are Burning or affected by Pyro by 35%
ArchaicPetra_FourPieceSet:
Upon obtaining a crystal created through a Geo Elemental Reaction, all party members gain 35% Elemental DMG Bonus to that particular element for 10s.
Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time
RetracingBolide_FourPieceSet: Gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG while under the protection of a shield
Prayers_for_Destiny: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.
Prayers_for_Illumination: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.
Prayers_to_Springtime: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.
Prayers_for_Wisdom: Affected by Electro for 40% less time.
Fire_Of_Passion:
Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.
Increases ATK by 25%.
Healing_Water:
Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.
Increases incoming healing by 30%.
Swift_Wind:
Decreases Stamina Consumption by 15%.
Increases Movement SPD by 10%. Shortens Skill CD by 5%.
Energetic_Lightning:
Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.
Superconduct, Overloaded, and Electro-Charged have a 100% chance to generate an Electro Elemental Particle.
(CD: 5s)
Crushing_Ice:
Affected by Electro for 40% less time.
Increases CRIT Rate against enemies that are Frozen or affected by Cryo by 15%.
Floating_Rock:
Increases resistance to interruption.
When protected by a shield, increases Attack DMG by 15%.
Image_Save_Question: Do you want to save image?
Party_Name_Blank: You have to write at least 1 letter
Party_Delete_Question: Are you sure to delete party named
Party_Reset_Question: Are you sure to reset current party?(ONLY current party)
Party_Override_Question: Are you sure to override party?
Party_Name_Overlap: You have already used this name!
Party_Blank_Space: You have to arrange at least 1 character
